content: I'm looking for some gift ideas for my sister's birthday, which is coming up soon. I'm on a budget, so I'd love some suggestions for affordable yet thoughtful gifts. By the way, I just got back from the annual Holiday Market at the local mall and purchased a beautiful handmade silver necklace for $50, and got a pair of earrings for $25, which was a great deal considering the "buy one, get one 50% off" deal on all jewelry.
